operation.name: insert
operation.sqlmap:
INSERT INTO project_recovery_litigation_before_trail(
project_recovery_id, opening_time, notice_time, clerk_arrived_time, jurisdiction_objection, jurisdiction_objection_judgment, jurisdiction_objection_appeal, jurisdiction_objection_judgment_second, evidence_exchange, appraisal_apply, appraisal_material, appraisal_amount, investigating_apply, witnesses_apply, increase_litigation_apply, memo, end_notice, litigation_index, raw_add_time ) VALUES ( #projectRecoveryId#, #openingTime#, #noticeTime#, #clerkArrivedTime#, #jurisdictionObjection#, #jurisdictionObjectionJudgment#, #jurisdictionObjectionAppeal#, #jurisdictionObjectionJudgmentSecond#, #evidenceExchange#, #appraisalApply#, #appraisalMaterial#, #appraisalAmount#, #investigatingApply#, #witnessesApply#, #increaseLitigationApply#, #memo#, #endNotice#, #litigationIndex#, #rawAddTime# ) <selectKey resultClass ="long" keyProperty ="id" > SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID </selectKey>

operation.name: updateEndNotice
operation.sql: UPDATE project_recovery_litigation_before_trail SET end_notice=? WHERE id=?

operation.name: findNoticeByOpeningTime
